name: part_000
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO24_DAY2】hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment HoneyWorks stage DAY2【チラ見せ】 [XuQm_HL2ntg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening title card for hololive 5th fes. Capture the Moment, showing various members and the message 'The concert will be starting soon.'
Attention screens for visitors in Japanese and English, covering safety rules and cheering guidelines.
Promotion of official concert goods and information regarding their sales periods.
A slideshow of fan-submitted messages and artwork on a virtual message board titled 'Capture the Moment'.

subtitles.original: The concert will be starting soon.
subtitles.english: The concert will be starting soon.
